description.en: Shrek is a non-fungible token (NFT) & Gaming platform which can be found on Binance Smart Chain and multi-chain. Our vision is to become a hub for the biggest games in the blockchain industry. We plan to achieve this through a blockchain’s distributed ledger, gamers can use one perfected character or set of skills and items across crypto digital worlds like Binance Smart Chain and multi-chain. This means they can earn rewards more quickly, and then exchange them through one decentralized source like NFT.
